body_html: I am currently using it like that with my own wrapper around it and think that it is supposed to work like that as tf.contrib.layers.dropout does: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L433-L435
body_text: I am currently using it like that with my own wrapper around it and think that it is supposed to work like that as tf.contrib.layers.dropout does: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L433-L435
body: I am currently using it like that with my own wrapper around it and think that it is supposed to work like that as `tf.contrib.layers.dropout` does: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L433-L435
